subject: RE: Front B Sections 1- 4
body:
Hi Arnel
Thanks for that. Please proceed with modelling the remaining geometry for Front B – Construction Galleries package, i.e., Y-junctions and ramps towards the resort. As discussed, the 3D modelling needs to be completed by
CoB tomorrow (04/04/2025)
.
We need to start cutting sections for the Front B – Construction Galleries package on
Monday (07/04/2025)
.
@Villafuerte, Alex
/
@Villareal, May
– please see link below.
Regards
Yoshe
From:
Arabe, Arnel <Arnel.Arabe@wsp.com>
Sent:
Thursday, 3 April 2025 11:33 AM
To:
Lozano, Mary Grace <MaryGrace.Lozano@wsp.com>; Christine, Yoshe <Yoshe.Christine@wsp.com>
Cc:
Larsson, Alfred <alfred.larsson@wsp.com>; Abitong, Dinesto <Dinesto.Abitong@wsp.com>
Subject:
RE: Front B Sections 1- 4
Hi Yoshe,
Here is the link to the updated section for  LT 3-5.

From:
Christine, Yoshe
Sent:
Wednesday, April 2, 2025 8:05 AM
To:
Lozano, Mary Grace
Cc:
Larsson, Alfred; Arabe, Arnel; Abitong, Dinesto
Subject:
FW: Front B Sections 1- 4
Hi Grace
Please cut Section LT_5 – see below and Section LT_4.
Section LT-4 was cut on Monday but it was cut in the wrong location (see attached).
Let me know once you are done with the sections. I will give you a call later.
Thanks and regards
Yoshe
From:
Christine, Yoshe
Sent:
Tuesday, 1 April 2025 9:38 AM

Subject:
RE: Front B Sections 1- 4
Hi Arnel
Could you please cut another section – Section LT-5 when you are back tomorrow?
Once it’s done, please model the remaining construction galleries based on the current alignment, cut some sections along the control lines and cross sections as per markups on the BB session.
Thanks and regards
Yoshe
